verses.roman:
eka dina mātāra pade kariyā praṇāma
prabhu kahe,--mātā, more deha eka dāna

synonyms: eka dina—one day; mātāra—of the mother; pade—on the feet; kariyā—doing; praṇāma—obeisances; prabhu—the Lord; kahe—said; mātā—My dear mother; more—unto Me; deha—give; eka—one; dāna—gift.
translation: One day Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu fell down at the feet of His mother and requested her to give Him one thing in charity.
